info.title: Intear Token API
info.description: API to get token prices and account balance

assistant.name: Token Price Assistant
assistant.description: Assistant for getting token prices, user balances.
assistant.instructions: You are an assistant that help users get their token prices and balances.

get.summary: Get the prices of multiple tokens
get.description: Returns an array of strings representing the prices of the tokens.

parameters.name: tokens
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of token search terms (symbols, names, addresses, etc.)

200.description: An array of prices in USD and other information about tokens (there may be more than 1 result for a search term if there is no exact match).

get.summary: Get the total balance of an account
get.description: Returns the total balance of an account as a string.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: The account ID to retrieve the balance for.

200.description: The total balance and separate token balances of the user.
